name: Donald J. TRUMP, et al., Petitioners, v. MAZARS USA, LLP, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Donald J. TRUMP, et al., Petitioners,
v.
MAZARS USA, LLP, et al.
casebody.head_matter:
Donald J. TRUMP, et al., Petitioners,
v.
MAZARS USA, LLP, et al.
No. 19-715.
Supreme Court of the United States.
April 27, 2020
The parties and the Solicitor General are directed to file supplemental letter briefs addressing whether the political question doctrine or related justiciability principles bear on the Court's adjudication of this case. The briefs, not to exceed 15 pages, are to be filed simultaneously with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 2 p.m., Friday, May 8, 2020.
